{{Quote|I'm going to pick the fastest ship in our fleet. I'm going to choose the fifty best killers on the Iron Islands. I'm going to sail up the narrow sea, all the way to the Weeping Water. I'm going to march on the Dreadfort. I'm going to find my little brother. And I'm going to bring him home.|Yara Greyjoy|Mhysa}}
The '''Assault on the Dreadfort''' is an attempted rescue mission during the [[War of the Five Kings]].
sections.In the books: The Assault on the Dreadfort does not occur in the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels. Instead, Asha (Yara's book counterpart) remains garrisoned at Deepwood Motte, as per her father's orders, and is ignorant of Theon's survival.
